doc.title: Lenin's Secret Files
doc.plot: A report on secret documents found in a bomb-proof vault that reveal the truth behind the myth of Vladimir Ilich Ulyanov, or Lenin. The revolutionary man of ideas and action committed to the communist cause also emerges as a man tormented by ill-health and subject to violent mood swings, and someone who ordered mass executions knowing that he had only a short time left to influence the Russian Revolution.
